item.title: Betty
item.description: Handcrafted cutting board made from walnut, maple, and padauk, uniquely named to reflect its one-of-a-kind design. Durable and stylish, perfect for daily use or serving.

item.title: Tiger
item.description: Handcrafted black walnut and epoxy side table with black and gold swirls, mid-century modern legs, and a walnut, maple, and purple heart coaster.
